article_title: Rep board didn’t tell whole story behind DeWine’s litigation

article_metadata.description: The Repository’s editorial board failed to tell readers important information when it urged Stark County to join Ohio Attorney General DeWine’s transitional reinsurance fee litigation (“DeWine files lawsuit over Affordable Care Act fee,” Jan. 27).First, the editorial board failed to mention the cost of this litigation. For example, DeWine’s staff will spend thousands of hours on this litigation.  Time that could be spent putting criminals in jail and keeping
